alert.note: Alert for Okanogan Highlands (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 31 at 12:14PM PDT until April 01 at 4:00PM PDT by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 4 PM PDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected mainly above 3000 feet. Total snow accumulations between 3 and 6 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Boulder Creek Road, Sherman Pass, Chesaw Road, Highway 20 Wauconda Summit, and Wauconda. * WHEN...From 11 PM this evening to 4 PM PDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Motorists traveling on State Route 20 should be prepared for winter driving conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The late season sun angle will contribute to higher accumulation efficiency for snow that falls overnight and early in the morning. Snowfall rates up to an inch per hour and falling temperatures Friday night will create winter driving conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
